description: '''Hindutva pop''', often referred to as '''H-Pop''', is a genre of [[Indian pop|Indian pop music]] that promotes [[Hindutva]], a [[Hindu nationalism|Hindu nationalist]] ideology. The music has become increasingly popular in the 2010s and 2020s and frequently includes [[Islamophobia|Islamophobic]] lyrics. The songs have sometimes been played on loudspeakers by Hindutva groups during [[Violence against Muslims in India|violent attacks on Indian Muslims]].
